briefdescription.para: Returns an auto-generated unique material ID.

detaileddescription.para: This method is intended as a utility method for user's writing OpenMOC input files. The method makes use of a static material ID which is incremented each time the method is called to enable unique generation of monotonically increasing IDs. The method's first ID begins at 10000. Hence, user-defined material IDs greater than or equal to 10000 is prohibited.
